Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
represents the game. this class is used as root of the model to connect every entity inside of it.
Since:
1.5

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected BasicRules basic
    represents the rules followed by all the players, regardless of their cards
    private java.util.ArrayList<Card> chosenCards
    represents the list of the cards used in this match
    private Dealer dealer
    represents the Challenger of the game's match
    private java.util.ArrayList<Card> deck
    represents the deck of all the cards that can be used in a game
    private java.lang.Boolean disconnect  
    protected Board gameBoard
    represents the board where the game is played
    private boolean gameEnded
    this boolean indicates if the game has ended
    private static int MAXNUMBUILDERS
    represents the maximum number of workers that a player can have
    private NetInterface netInterface
    represents the interface used by the server to communicate with the clients
    int numberOfPlayers
    represents the number of players in the game
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList
    represents the list of the players that play in the match
    private Player winningPlayer
    represents the player who wins the game

      public Game​(int numberOfPlayers, NetInterface netInterface)
      creates a new game.
      Parameters:

    • setGameEnded

      public void setGameEnded​(boolean value)
      communicates if the game has ended, setting gameEnded
      Parameters:
      value - If True, indicates that the game has ended.

    • addPlayer

      public int addPlayer​(Player player)
      adds a new player to the game.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player object.
      Returns:
      1, if the player has been successifully added, 0 otherwise

    • addChosenCard

      public void addChosenCard​(int cardNumber)
      adds the card chosen by the Challenger at the beginning of the game to the list of the available cards that can be chosen by a player.
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - is the number that identifies the card chosen by the Challenger.

    • deployBuilder

      public java.lang.String deployBuilder​(Player player, Square placement) throws java.io.IOException
      puts a new worker on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player that is deploying the worker.
      placement - is the square where the player wants to put the worker.
      Returns:
      the message regarding the outcome of the operation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      public void setDealer​(Player player)

      get the card from the list of cards chosen by the Challenger
      Parameters:
      cardPosition - is the index of chosenCards where the card is saved
      Returns:

      public Player getWinningPlayer()
      Returns:
